thread.title: Marko kenfelja
thread.title_full: Simple Fishing reviewed by Marko kenfelja

author: Marko kenfelja
title: Marko kenfelja
text:
My first simple fishing box was received in a timely fashion. Was very excited to see what you guys sent . I was pleasantly surprised to see the quality of goodies inside . Trout style swim baits , jig heads , some plastics and gap hooks. All stuff I would use .
I love here in Toronto Canada and getting these mystery boxes through the winter months definitely gets you excited for spring fishing ( I don't do much ice fishing ) . That being said hopefully the next mystery box for march /April will be geared towards spring fishing ... trout , perch etc...
Keep up good work ... Looking forward to next package
Marko
